arts.ttl: Gazzetta: AC Milan players ratings in 2-2 draw vs Pisa
arts.sum: AC Milan lost two points against Pisa at San Siro last night. It was a disappointing night for the Rossoneri team of head coach Massimiliano Allegri and the fans. Who was the best player for AC Milan against Pisa last night? Luka Modric had the best rating (along with Pisa's Juan Cuadrado) with a rating […]

arts.ttl: Gazzetta: Milan slows down against Pisa – Not the night for pulling away
arts.sum: Milan has the newly promoted team syndrome. Beaten at home by Cremonese on the first day, they nearly fell again last night against Pisa. They saved a 2-2 draw in the 93rd minute with a precise shot from Athekame, disastrous up to that point as a substitute, then the savior, showing again what football is, […]

arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Pisa 2 | Allegri: “We made mistakes… We must keep working”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, Milan's coach, spoke to Sky Sport 24 after Milan-Pisa 2-2. His statements: Never satisfied during the game: what is your analysis? arts.ttl: Athekame ‘happy’ but also ‘disappointed’ after Milan’s 2-2 draw against Pisa
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller After the game between AC Milan and Pisa, which ended in a 2-2 draw, the Rossoneri’s final goalscorer Zachary Athekame shared his thoughts with the media. It ended up being a frustrating evening for Milan at San Siro. arts.ttl: Milan 2 – Pisa 2 | Modric: “We should have killed the game in the first half”
arts.sum: Luka Modric spoke to DAZN after Milan-Pisa 2-2. His words: What could this Milan do better? “We should have killed the game in the first half. We played well but scored only one goal. We started the second half softly, then there was the unlucky penalty and the goal. But this is football, that’s why […]

arts.ttl: Watch: Athekame earns Milan a late point against Pisa with long-range strike
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Zachary Athekame’s first goal for AC Milan was a memorable one, as he netted an added-time equaliser for AC Milan against Pisa. Milan were forced to settle with a 2-2 draw against the side who came into the game bottom of the lead.
